summary: A test suite dedicated to validating the Data2VecVision model’s behavior across vision tasks. It checks configuration integrity, proper initialization, forward passes for classification and segmentation, handling of alternative input embeddings, loading from pretrained checkpoints, multi‑GPU data‑parallel execution, training loops, and gradient‑checkpointing support, while also confirming consistency between PyTorch and TensorFlow implementations.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the Data2VecVision vision model for production use, ensuring reliable performance across various training and inference scenarios.
